content: The **Third Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet** was the third [Cabinet of Singapore](/wiki/Cabinet_of_Singapore) formed by Prime Minister [Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew) in 1968, after the [1968 Singaporean general election](/wiki/1968_Singaporean_general_election). The cabinet lasted until 1972, with one shuffle in 1970. ## Cabinet The Third Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet consisted of the following members. PortfolioNameTerm startTerm end[Prime Minister](/wiki/Prime_Minister_of_Singapore)[Lee Kuan Yew](/wiki/Lee_Kuan_Yew)16 April 196815 September 1972[Minister for Science and Technology](/wiki/Minister_for_Science_and_Technology)[Toh Chin Chye](/wiki/Toh_Chin_Chye)16 April 196815 September 1972[Minister for Finance](/wiki/Ministry_of_Finance_(Singapore))[Goh Keng Swee](/wiki/Goh_Keng_Swee)16 April 196810 August 1970[Hon Sui Sen](/wiki/Hon_Sui_Sen)11 August 197015 September 1972[Minister for Foreign Affairs](/wiki/Ministry_of_Foreign_Affairs_(Singapore))[S. title: Third Lee Kuan Yew Cabinet
